divs: Sighting DetailsAfter it hovered the second time it shot over the building. The only other person on the deck was a woman on a lounge chair and she said did you guys see that . We ran around to the front of the motel and there were other people looking at the sky talking about it. I was about 14 then and I'm 37 now I've wondered all these years what it could have been and still to this day can't explain it,I've never seen anything move like that it didn't make a sound and moved like a streak of lightning,not really sure of exact date
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
Summary: on the deck of the holiday inn,me and a friend were looking out over the oceon at what we thought was a ship when all of a sudden it shot across the sky faster than ive ever seen anything move then stopped on a dime and hovered again then it shot over the
